title.rendered: Eldorado Stone introduces new, larger Mezzaluna artisan fire bowl

content.rendered:
Eldorado Stone, manufacturer of the world’s most believable architectural stone veneer, has debuted the new Mezzaluna artisan fire bowl. With a grand diameter of 48 inches, the Mezzaluna is larger than other artisan bowls in the manufacturer’s outdoor collection.

“The Mezzaluna fire bowl in Oyster Shell adds an element of graceful luxury to any outdoor space,” says Ramsay Hawfield, director of marketing for Eldorado Stone. “Its modern, sweeping arc design is a harmonious balance of function and art that transforms outdoor entertaining spaces.”

The Southern California-based company handcrafts the Mezzaluna and other artisan fire bowls using a proprietary blend of limestone aggregate, minerals, and other materials. The smooth, velvety texture of the Mezzaluna offers the exquisite look and feel of natural limestone.

The creation of livable, relaxing outdoor spaces has been a popular design trend, as noted by The American Society of Landscape Architects. The Mezzaluna leads this trend by providing a stunning focal point for outdoor gatherings. With its graceful design and authentic appearance, the Mezzaluna fire bowl is an elegant new addition to Eldorado Stone’s collection of artisan fire bowls and the perfect showpiece for luxury outdoor designs.

About Eldorado Stone
Eldorado Stone® creates the world’s most believable architectural stone veneer. For more than 40 years, Eldorado Stone has demonstrated an undeniable passion for creating authentic products that not only elevate quality and design, but also attainability. From stone and brick to outdoor products and fireplace surrounds, Eldorado handcrafted products transform ordinary environments into unique and memorable spaces. For more information and to view galleries of inspiring installations, visit eldoradostone.com.

 

Download Press Release
